spec_data.Name: dspam-devel
spec_data.Description:
DSPAM has had its core engine moved into a separate library, libdspam.
This library can be used by developers to provide 'drop-in' spam
filtering for their mail client applications, other Anti-Spam tools, or
similar projects.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 02:23:02 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Development library and header files for libdspam
